div.p: Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene quarto die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The saide day marione houysone spous' to mathow branche was conuict
be ane suorne assis' Johne Colisone forspekar for strubulance of Jonet of
Kyntor seruande tile Alexander malyson' for the quhilkis scho was in ane
amerciament of the court and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum Ande
the said' Jonet was conuict be the saide assis' for strubulance of the saide ma
rioun' for the quhilkis scho was in ane Amerciament of the court and tile amende as
law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum Ande the said' assis' ordanit and deliuerit
that the saide partiis sale cum befor the ballieis and Counsal one friday that
next cumis thar' tile vndirlie thar deliuerance anent the Amendis to be maid'
for the saide demeritis Ande atour the said' assis' deliuerit and ordanit that batht
the saide partiis suld' Sett sufficient Caucioun' tile vthiris to be skathtles and
vntrubulit and the partj brekand' tile vthir and beis conuict tharof sal pay xl s' to
the partj kepand' Ande thareftir Alexander malisone come souerte be his hand landis and
gudis that the sad' Jonet suld' nocht trubul the saide marioun' in tym to Cum and giff scho
beis conuict tharof he sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin Ande
mathou branche come Souerte be his hande landis and gudis to pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes werk gif euere his wif trubulis the said' Jonet in tyme to Cum and
beis conuict' tharof And' the saidez Alexander was law borgh' for the said' Jonet
and the saide mathow was law borrouis for his said' spous' and bringe
the saide personis one friday befor the balyeis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis Junij
anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander prat grantit that he was borghe to do It that lawe for Johne of
mydiltonis' maile for the hous' quhilkis he Inhabitis this yer' bigane

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne of Cullane forspekar
that Elizabetht Waus sale bruk the croft pertening to Dauy prat hir' sone
ay and quhile cristy prat Cum and preiwe Sufficientlie that he hed' dischargit
hir' of the saide croft in dewe tyme Ande hede sufficient pouer' tharto

The saide day charlis Smytht grantit and oblist him be the fatht of his bodie
to pay to sere Johne Rede four' s' Scottis money of his annuele aucht to him
of the lande quhilkis he Inhabit this yer' bigane betuix this and Sanct
berthilmowe day nixt to Cum

The said' day Jonhne of meldrum lauchfullie warnit callit ande comperit
within the said' tolbutht tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne
of mar' procurator tile Arthour Andirsone for the wranguis withhaldin fra him of
the key of the hous' quhilkis he Inhabitis and of the Witsonday male of
the samyn immediate bigane Ande William scrimgeor ane of the officiaris
of the saide burghe' at commavnd' of the ballieis chargit the saide Johne
thus' with his wand' of Office tile ansuer to the said' borghe' accor
ding tile Justice quhilkis passit furtht of the said tolbutht Ande thareftir
the saide William scrimgeor officiar' at charge of the saide balleis passit
and follouit the said' Johne and chargit him in our Souerane lordis nayme the
Aldirman and ballieis to Returne agan to the saide tolbutht and ansuer to
the said' borghe' quhilkis walde nocht cum agan and the said' officiar'
brek his wande of office of the said' Johne and present the said' brokin
wande in the court Ande preuit the said' dissobeing with Adam of fyf
and Alexander Rate for the quhilkis the saide Johne was in ane Amerciament of the
court et cetera and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum And' that
was gevin for dome et cetera

head.add: continuacio mariote honyson' et Jonete Kintor

div.p:
The saide day the Amendis of the demeritis done betuix marioun'
houysone one that ane part Ande Jonet Kyntor one that vthir part
eftir the tenor of the act maid' obefor In hoipe of concord'
Is continevit to monunday that next cumis in hoip of concord'
at the Instance of sere Johne Sterueling for fauoris concorde ande
vnite tile Intres' ymang the saide partiis in tymes to Cum and
for the tendir blud' and alya betuix thame

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die mensis
Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Johne of mydiltoun' oblist and band' him be his hande vphaldin
to freitht and Releiwe Johne horne burges of the saide burghe of ane annuell
Rent of xl d' gif it beis optenit one him for the lande liand' in the
schipraw betuix the lande of vmquhile Johne fechat one the northt part ande
the land' of vmquhile Johne Andirson' pattyn' makar one the southt parte bocht
fra him be the saide Johne horne

The saide day Jonhne farlie was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Johne cullan
forspekar' for the forstallinge of the borghe' in bying of Skinnis for the quhilkis
he was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

head.add: strubulance of the court Alexander moreson'

div.p:
The said' day Johne farly was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullane
forspekar for strubulance of Alexander morisone for the quhilkis he was in Ane
amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day Marioun' howysone Spous' to mathou branche was conuict be
ane Suorne assis' Johne Cullane forspekar for trubulance of Jonet Kyntor
seruande to Alexander Malisone for the quhilkis scho was in ane Amerciament of the court
and to Amende as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day Johne loremar' grantit him avande to Johne arthour xxix s' of
Siluer to Compt and Rekning quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne of Cullan for
spekar that Robert schand' watirman' sale pay alsmekle' fische to hen
ry Red' as he Intrometit witht And gif euyr he dois siclik thing'
in tyme to cum to be expellit fra the watir And the said henry to pay
the said Robert for the sclaying of the said fische And gif the
said henres man' happinis to be absent to be expellit fray
the said watir Richt sua et cetera

The said day Jonet Kintor was conuikit be ane suorne assis' Johnne
of Cullane forspekar for the stribulance of canne houysoun' in word'
ffor the quhilkis sche was in ane amerciament of the court and to
amend' as law wile and forber in tyme to cum et cetera

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the bailyes and counsale
present for the tyme that Johnne scrogis coupar sale nocht wyrke
nay werk pertenyng to the couparis craft within the fredome of this
burgh' for d his demeritis done to the haile toun' in tymes bigan'
leswis' thane he wirk witht free men' of the said craft of the said'
burgh' and' thar to enderly and stand for his werk and' pay him
for his labouris thai fyndand him caucioun' for his pament
Safar as he wirkis and' makis laubour tharfor et cetera

The said day sere Johne of stirueling notar ande clerk to the court for the tyme humlie
exponit to the bailyeis ande counsaile of the saide burghe' that he was sickerly ad
uertist ande Informit that mathoue branche thane present hed' opponit agane ane act'
of the saide court buk maide be the diliuerance of ane suorne assis' Johne collisone
forspekar at commande of thomas leslie and thomas Waus tua of the bailyeis of the
Saide burgh' sittande within the tolbutht of the samyne in Jugement at the diliuerance
of the said assis' ande making of the saide act' sayande he sulde preiwe the saide act'
fals in four of fiwe poyntis to the gret Infamite ande dishonor to the saide bailyeis sit
tande as Jugez ande hyme that wrait the saide act as it was deliuerit be the saide
assis' ande Incontrar Justice as he allegit besekande vtheris bailyes ande counsaile
that thai waulde wechsaif to ger reid heir see ande vnderstande the saide act' ande
be thar aithtis determe and decerne vpone the samyne gif it was ditit ande writin
in the court buk of the saide burgh' as it was deliuerit be the saide assis' ande orda
nit be the saide bailyeis ande askit mathow branche tile obiect' and oppone'
agane the saide act' gif he hede ony rycht or persuasioun' tharto quhilk opponit
nor saide nay thing agane the saide act' Ande thar eftir the saide thomas les
lie ande thomas Waus complenyeit to patry leslie ane of the bailyeis of the
Saide burgh' sittande in Jugment that the saide mathow branch' one monun
day the Nynt day of this Instant monetht of Junij in the bailye court of
the saide burgh' haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn' hed tribulit and wrang
it thame ande the saide sere Johne in his absence clerk to thame sayande that
he sulde preiw the saide act' fals in four or fiw poyntis requirande thame
for remeide of Justis Ande Incontinent the saide mathoue beande accusit
denyit that euire he apponit agane the saide act' or committit ony tribulance
to the saidez balyeis ande notar quhilk allegijt ande saide vnder his pro
testacioun' as efferis hawande regres' to my lorde of Abirdene his Juge or
dinar he waulde nocht sustene the saide wrang' et cetera for the Some of ij
merkis vpone the quhilkis the saide patry leslie balye vnderstandande this
Supplicacioun' beande rychtuis' ande consonant to resone causit alexander menyeis
Dauid menyeis Johne of cullane alexander reide androw cullane James colsone
Duncan colisone patry reide Johne Wormet Johne Waus William colpe
Johne arthour richerde Waus Duncane craik androw body
witht consent of baith the saide partijs to be oblist ande suorne
the gret bodely aitht to determe deliuer ande ferthgew thar deliuerance in
the premiss' quhilkis riplie auisit the resonis ande allegaciounis of baitht
the saide pertys herde Sene considerit and' vnderstande ale in ane woice
concordande deliuerit Ande fande the said' Act' Sufficient ande deuly maide Ande
writin eftir the tenour of the deliuerance of the assis' gevin tharapone Ande atour
thai fande the saide mathoue hede doune wrang to the saide bailyeis ande notar
Sayande that he sulde preiwe the saide act' fals in iiij or v poyntis for the
quhilkis the saide mathoue was in ane amerciament of the court ande to amende
to the party as law wile ande forbeir in tyme to cum Ande that was gevin for
dome

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and counsale present for the tyme for the
vphaldin and Sustening of dyvine seruice in the queir' and kirk of abirdene
In the honor of god' the glorious' virgine mary Sanct nicholes thar patron'
and ale Sanctis conducit hyrit and feit Wat strachin sangastir to Syng and help
to vphald dyvin' seruice within the said' kirk for his mett with viij personis
Circualie oukly and drink and xxtj s' of Siluer yerlie Ilkan yer' to be tane
of ane burges to be chosin and gottin be the said' Wat or ony of his frendis
to by him ane gown' et cetera quhilkis thai thankfullie promittit to the said' Wat
et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem xvij die mensis Junij
anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo quinto

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de abirdene xvijo die mensis Junij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo
quinto Coram honorabilis viris thoma Waus et Dauid Steuart duobus balliuorum
dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem In curia cape balliuorum protribunali sedenti per subscriptis
videlicet Alexandrum menyeis Dauid menyeis patricium Rede Andream fyf Willelmum
Wormet Willelmum Colp patricium chernside Johannem Kintor alexandrum malisone
Johannem Waus Dauid' Kyntor Johannem Ramsay Dauid fynne Johannem murray
Juniorem Andream meldrum Alexandrum burnat and Andream stratone burgenses dicti burgi Quj
Jurati dicunt quod quondam Duncanus blinsele frater Dauid blinsele latoris presencium obiit
vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra
videlicet duabus Opellis vna camera et Solio cum suis pertinencijs Jacente infra dictum burgum in
vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Colisone ex australi ex vna et
terram Alexandri menyeis ex boreali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus oriens et
terram Alexandri Rollande et mariorie traill versus occidens Et quod dictus Dauid est legittimus
et propinquior heres dicti quondam Duncanj fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinencijs Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum vigintj solidos et valuit xiij s' et iiijor d' tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis per decessum dicti quondam Duncanj fratre suj per
spacium trium annorum aut eocirca In defectu virj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis
Datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti balliui et Sigillis quorundam eorum qui hinc
Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day marione mathousone warnit callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
to thomas chamer for certane gudis of arschip for the quhilkis the saide
marion was in ane Amerciament of the court and the balyeis chargit Androw nachtj
Officiar' to pas' and distrenye the said' marioun et cetera and warne hir' to comper
one the morne tile ansuer for the said' gudis of airschipe

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauy menyeis
forspekar that gif Johne Scrogis Coupar happinis to brek the statut and ordinance
maid' Obefor be the towne that he salbe expellit this towne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die Junij
anno quo supra

The saide day Johne of meldrum lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit tile
her' and se our Souerane lordis lettres present be him Anent the maile of ane lande
and pundis takin be Johne of mar' for the maile of the samyn putt to dewe
execucioun quhilkis warning William scrimgeor preuit Sufficientlie befor the
saide balyeis

The saide day Comperit Johne of mar' procurator tile arthour Andirsone and
askit at Johne mydiltoun' and Alexander horne gif thai gaf commavnde to Johne
of meldrum to Complenye one him to our Souerance lorde and his lordis of
Counsale for the pundis takin for the maile of the hous' quhilkis thai
Occupeit pertening to the saide arthour' or gif thai war' planteous'
one him in ony thingis and specialy in the pontis contenit in our Souerane
lordis lettres directit to the aldirman and ballieis tharupon' thame being present
and opinly Rede in Jugement Offering him redy tile do to thame ale
that Accordis him to do of law and resone Ande the saide Johne myd
diltone and Alexander horne opinly ansuerde and declarit that thai war nocht complan
teous' one the saide Johne of mar' nor gaf him nay commavnde to
Complenye one him for ony pontis contenit in the saide our Souerane lordis lettres
forsaid Apon the quhilkis the saide Johne mar' askit Instrument at
me sere Johne Stirueling notar and befor thir witnes thomas chamer
Androw fyf William Wormet Richard Waus Johne moir' patry leslie
yongar

The saide day the balyeis chargit William scrimgeor and gilbert
prestone seriandis to pas' and warne Johne of meldrum to Comper one
firday that nixt Cumis befor tham tile Ansuer' for dissobeing of
thame
the ballieis and officiaris eftir the tenor of the actis maide tharpon' Obefor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis Junij
anno quo supra

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Inquest of the court that ane stellatour'
for aquavite and ros' wattir was ayrschipe tharfor the balyeis ordanit and
chargit george barbour' to deliuere the stellatour' being in his handis perte
ning tile vmquhile sere Androw gray to mastir Androw crafurd' procurator to dene
Robert Keruour' ayr to the saide vmquhile ser Androu

The said' day gilbert menyeis producit ane lettir of our Soueran lordis vndir
the Signet of the deliuerance of the lordis of Counsale to the balyeis charge
and' thame to Compele and distrenye mathow branche and Dauid mar' for
to Releiwe him of the pament of xxvj li' and xvj s' optenit one him be
george eduardson' as in the samyn mair' fullie Is contenit quhilk being
Red' the said' gilbert diuers' tymes Requirit Thomas leslie thomas Waus
Dauy stevarte and patry leslie balyeis to put the said' lettir to dewe exe
cucioun' and caus' him be Relevit likuis' as he has done diuers' and
Sindrie tymes bigane And' protestit that he mycht haue regres' to his
lande quhilkis thai hede apprisit and Sellit for the said' Some and askit
Intrument of me tharapon' befor sere thomas myrtone thesaurar' of Abirdene
Alexander menyeis Dauy menyeis Johne scheues maser Alexander Rede Johne of mar'
mastir Johne badenaghe and mastir Androw Crafurd Actio in dicto pretorio habe qui xij in meridie Johannes Stirueling Notarius manu
propria
The said' day

The saide day Alexander Rede James Colisone patry rede Williame Wormet ande
Williame of Kintor at commavnd' of the ballieis prisit iiijor barellis salmond' beande
in the handis of Dauy fynne quhilkis he allegit to be pait at lammes next
to Cum pertening to mathou branche to nyne pundis for part of pament of his
part of the Some of xxvj li' and xvj s' Recouerit one him and Dauy mar'
for the Releving of gilbert menyes tharanent eftir the tenor of our Souerane
lordis lettres directit tharupon' Ande thareftir becaus' the said mathou was
absent thomas leslie thomas Waus Dauy stevart and Dauy patry
leslie balyeis oblist thame to pay to the said' gilbert ix li' one Wed
nysday that next Cumis or ellis ger' pay to him the said' iiijor barrellis Salmond'
at lammes nixt hereftir Ande to pas' compell punde and distrenye the
gudis of the saide mathow for the Rest of his part of the said' Some
be the said' Wednisday and mak the saide gilbert be content and pait tharof
